snippet.title: Gran Turismo 5 (GT5) Academy Edition Official Trailer
snippet.description: Gran Turismo is one of the biggest names in videogame racing, renowned for its unique level of realism and stunning graphics. Every version has set the benchmark for other driving simulators to follow, and now - with the awesome power of the PS3 behind it - Gran Turismo 5: Academy Edition is about to raise the bar even further.
